name: Thundercat Whitsundays - All Inclusive Day Tour
description: Thundercat offers an exhilarating ride around the Whitsunday Islands, perfect for those seeking adventure and breathtaking scenery. This award-winning tour provides a thrilling yet comfortable experience, ideal for families, couples, and groups eager to explore the iconic Whitehaven Beach and the vibrant marine life of the Great Barrier Reef. With its emphasis on stability and speed, Thundercat is designed to accommodate passengers concerned about seasickness, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable journey. The tour combines adventure with comfort, featuring guided bush walks, snorkeling opportunities, and delicious meals prepared by qualified chefs.
includes:
Lycra suit
Snorkelling equipment (mask & snorkel only)
Wet suit (winter months)
On-board toilet
Lunch and snacks catered by qualified chefs
Local bus transfers
BYO Alcohol (eski and ice provided)
highlights:
Visit Whitehaven Beach (1.5 hours)
Guided bush walk to Hill Inlet Lookout
Snorkel two different locations on the fringing Great Barrier Reef
Travel with accredited Climate Action Leaders
Mantaray Bay – Teeming with an abundance of Marine Life
Stone Haven Bay – Snorkel the stunning Coral Gardens
Experience the iconic swirling sands of Hill Inlet Lookout
Enjoy fresh homemade baking for morning tea, afternoon tea and a buffet lunch
price_tiers: A$230 per adult | A$199 per child
locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hill Inlet,Langford,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
important_information: ['Children aged between 2 and 14 years old.', 'Children under two years old must be approved before departure and supply their own lifejacket.', 'Children one or under must have a baby carrier with a parent.', 'A ticket MUST be purchased for anyone 12 months and over.', 'Snorkelling is a physical activity. A certain level of fitness and ability is required to participate.']
what_to_bring: ['Pack a small waterproof bag and include: Sunscreen, sunglasses, a towel and a hat', 'Practical clothing and footwear (warmer items during winter)', 'Underwater camera', 'BYO alcohol (no glass or red wine) for the boat only', 'Refillable water bottle', 'A sense of fun and adventure!']
whats_extra: ['Thundercat does not cater to dietary requirements. Therefore, if the above menu does not satisfy the customer, they are welcome to bring their own snacks and place them in our esky.', 'We do not sell alcohol on the boat, but all guests are welcome to BYO and place cans in the esky.', 'No red wine or glass is allowed on the vessel.']

name: Tongarra Day Sailing Tour
description: Experience a thrilling day of sailing and adventure aboard Tongarra, where relaxation meets excitement in the stunning Whitsundays. This tour is perfect for those seeking a mix of leisure and adrenaline, offering activities like snorkeling, banana boat rides, and scenic beach walks. With a fantastic crew dedicated to ensuring an unforgettable experience, enjoy the spacious deck with comfy beanbags, savor delicious meals, and witness a breathtaking sunset as you sail back to Airlie Beach. Ideal for families, couples, and groups looking to explore the Whitsundays' hidden gems with a fun and vibrant atmosphere.
includes:
Snorkelling equipment (mask and snorkel only)
Environmental Management Charge (EMC)
Queensland Parks and Wildlife fees
Lunch and snacks
BYO alcohol (eski and ice provided)
highlights:
Sail on the spacious deck of Tongarra with bean bags
Snorkel at the best fringing reef in the region
Experience a thrilling banana boat ride
Enjoy a sunset sail back to Airlie Beach
Explore Langford Island and sandbar
Fun and informative ECO tour guides
Spot humpback whales (June to September)
locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hill Inlet,Langford,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
important_information: ['Age range – recommended 12+ years', 'Snorkelling is a physical activity. A certain level of fitness and ability is required to participate.']
what_to_bring: ['Pack a small waterproof bag and include: Sunscreen, sunglasses, a towel and a hat', 'Practical clothing and footwear (warmer items during winter)', 'Underwater camera', 'BYO alcohol (no glass or red wine) for the boat only']
whats_extra: ['BYO Alcohol (and we provide the eski and ice)', 'Snorkelling equipment (excluding prescription masks)']

name: Great Barrier Reef Snorkel Adventure
description: Experience the beauty of the world-famous Great Barrier Reef on this snorkelling eco-adventure. Travel on the smoothest, most comfortable vessel to visit the incredible coral wonderland of the outer reefs. This all-inclusive day trip is perfect for those seeking to bond while reconnecting with nature. Whether you're a couple searching for a romantic escape or a small group craving adventure and fun, this once-in-a-lifetime experience will deliver unbeatable memories. Enjoy the panoramic views from the 360° rooftop deck and relax in premium seating designed for extra comfort. The tour is led by Proud Climate Action Leaders with exceptional local knowledge, ensuring an eco-friendly and informative journey.
includes:
Free courtesy bus transfers
Lycra suits, snorkelling equipment, and wet suits (winter months)
Locally catered lunch and snacks
Fully licenced bar onboard (cash and card accepted)
Travel with accredited Climate Action Leaders
highlights:
Snorkel the world-famous Great Barrier Reef
360° rooftop deck for panoramic views
Relax in premium seating designed for extra comfort
Travel in style aboard a fully air-conditioned vessel
Guest numbers are kept personalised and well below capacity
See Humpback Whales during winter in their natural habitat
Swim & Snorkel in crystal clear waters
A day of adventure with creature comforts
Proudly Australian-owned business for the past 14 years
2018-2022 Gold National Tourism Award Winners
important_information: ['This tour is not recommended for Children under six years old.', 'Children under six years old must be approved before departure, and there are limitations regarding their participation in water activities.', 'Snorkelling is a physical activity. A certain level of fitness and ability is required to participate.', 'Recommended for confident swimmers that have previously snorkelled.']
what_to_bring: ['Pack a small waterproof bag and include: Sunscreen, sunglasses, a towel and a hat', 'Practical clothing and footwear (warmer items during winter)', 'Underwater camera', 'Cash or card for onboard purchases', 'Refillable water bottle', 'A sense of fun and adventure!']
whats_extra: ['Prescription Masks are not provided, so please BYO or visit Aqua Dive Hire & Services.', 'Enjoy a cold drink onboard with our fully licenced bar. We accept both cash and card on board for any additional purchases.']

name: Falls to Paradise – Waterfall Tour
description: Experience the ultimate tropical getaway with the Falls to Paradise tour, an all-inclusive day trip that combines nature exploration and relaxation. Swim in the refreshing rockpools of Cedar Creek Falls, surrounded by lush tropical flora and vibrant wildlife. After a morning of adventure, unwind at the award-winning Northerlies Beach Bar & Grill, where you can enjoy a delicious lunch and soak up stunning views of the Coral Sea. This tour is perfect for families and friends looking to connect with nature and enjoy a laid-back afternoon by the beach.
includes:
Swim in the rockpools at Cedar Creek Falls
Fun and informative tour guide
Delicious lunch prepared by a local chef
Alcoholic or non-alcoholic drink included
Courtesy coach available for extended stay at Northerlies
highlights:
Swim in one of Queensland’s most beautiful waterfalls
Enjoy the views from the beach bar while sipping creative cocktails
Private beach for the kids to explore
Award-winning restaurant and bar
ECO walk to the top of the falls
locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hill Inlet,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
what_to_bring: ['Practical clothing (waterproof jacket)', 'Enclosed footwear', 'Sunscreen, beach towel, and swimmers', 'Camera', 'A sense of adventure.']
whats_extra: ['Depending on the season, the waterfalls may not be running on your tour date.']
